user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark Thompson (mark.thompson@helpinghands.org) to introduce "Read to Succeed" program. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Details Needed for “Read to Succeed” Introduction Email

Hi Jane,

I’m about to draft the introduction email to Mark Thompson at Helping Hands Alliance regarding the “Read to Succeed” literacy program. Could you please add or point me to the following details in Notion (or reply here, whichever is faster)?

• One-paragraph program overview  
• Specific goals and measurable outcomes  
• Funding amount you’re requesting and how it will be allocated  
• Key dates (launch, major milestones, program end)  
• Any past success metrics or testimonials we should highlight  
• Contact person for follow-up questions

Once I have this information, I’ll finalize the message for Mark.

Many thanks for your help!

Best,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
